about.title: Bizz Solutions PLC. A Creative Fintech Solution Provider Located in Dhaka, Bangladesh
about.brief: Over 5 years working in IT services developing software applications and mobile apps for clients all over the world. We are one of the leading software companies renowned for its expertise in crafting innovative digital solutions. Established in 2018, the company has consistently pushed the boundaries of technology to provide cutting-edge software and services to clients worldwide.
